Actions.Name: Create SwissQR Bill (Preview)
Actions.Description: Create the SwissQR bill payment part with your PDF document. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/swiss-qr/swissqrapi/

Actions.Name: Read SwissQR Code (Preview)
Actions.Description: Read-out Billing Data from SwissQR Bill. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/swiss-qr/scan-swiss-qr-bill/

Actions.Name: Split Document by SwissQR Code (Preview)
Actions.Description: Split the PDF document by barcode types and filters. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/split-by-barcode-flow-connector/
